subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Paul Lawrie of Scotland held off Johan Edfors of Sweden by one stroke to win the Andalucian Open in Málaga, Spain, for his first European Tour victory since 2002.
snippet: Paul Lawrie of Scotland held off Johan Edfors of Sweden by one stroke to win the Andalucian Open in Málaga, Spain, for his first European Tour victory since 2002.
